definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
to distill/to break a liquid substance up into components by boiling
to steam/to cook in a steamer/to reheat cold food by steaming it

sentences.english: The new retorting technique would develop extensively in China, it is rich in lignite and subbituminous coal.
sentences.chinese: 中國年輕煤多，有利於發展新法乾餾技術。

sentences.english: The paper indicates the dry distillation concept in the process for treating Zn-Al-Fe slag.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了在處理鋁鐵鋅渣過程中鋅的乾餾概念。

sentences.english: The original commentary is about typical technologies for oil shale retorting.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了當今世界典型的油頁岩乾餾技術。
